Title: Apple supplier Foxconn's profit down 24per cent in last quarter of 2019
Content: Taiwanese electronics manufacturer Foxconn reported a 23.7per cent fall in profit in the last three months of 2019 on Monday as it braces for the impact from the coronavirus pandemic that has hit demand from key customers such as Apple.

Title: India says no plan to extend COVID-19 lockdown as poor struggle
Content: India has no plans to extend a 21-day lockdown to slow the spread of the coronavirus; the government said on Monday; as it struggled to keep essential supplies flowing and prevent tens of thousands of out-of-work people fleeing to the countryside.

Title: China's big banks flag asset pressure due to virus; boding ill for smaller kin

Content: Troubled fashion retailer Ted Baker  on Monday named Chief Financial Officer Rachel Osborne to the permanent role of chief executive officer; replacing Lindsay Page who stepped down last year.
